text: Queers Undermining Israeli Terrorism (QUIT!) is a gay San Francisco Bay Area political action group supporting "boycott, divestment and sanctions" against Israel; and opposing Pinkwashing of the ethnic cleansing of the Palestinian people. It was founded in early 2001 by a member of LAGAI-Queer Insurrection. According to the Anti-Defamation League the group "supports divestment, the right of return for all Palestinians, immediate Israeli withdrawal from Palestinian Territories and describes Zionism as racism". == Notes == == References == == Other websites == * Category:Israelâ€“United States relations Category:2001 establishments in California Category:LGBT-related controversies Category:Organizations based in California Category:LGBT in the United States Category:Protests Category:LGBT organisations in the United Kingdom Category:Gaza genocide Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Queers Undermining Israeli Terrorism
